join_sql: SELECT COALESCE(df0.ID, df1.ID) as ID, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__1 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__1, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__2 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__2, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__3 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__3, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__4 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__4, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__5 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__5, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__6 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__6, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__7 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__7, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__8 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__8, df0.TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__9 as TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__9, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__1 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__1, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__2 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__2, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__3 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__3, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__4 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__4, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__5 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__5, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__6 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__6, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__7 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__7, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__8 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__8, df1.TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__9 as TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__9 FROM df0 LEFT JOIN df1 ON df0.id=df1.id ;

hds.sql: CREATE TABLE _TBLNAME_ (ID VARCHAR not null, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__1 VARCHAR, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__2 VARCHAR, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__3 VARCHAR, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__4 VARCHAR, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__5 VARCHAR, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__6 VARCHAR, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__7 VARCHAR, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__8 VARCHAR, TBL1_COL__TBL1ID_HI__9 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__1 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__2 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__3 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__4 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__5 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__6 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__7 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__8 VARCHAR, TBL2_COL__TBL2ID_HI__9 VARCHAR, CONSTRAINT pk PRIMARY KEY (ID));
